events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and want to request a refund immediately because this is very inconvenient.
The customer's issue has been categorized under Refund due to the request for money back after receiving an incorrect item.
Assigning this refund request to the refund specialist team to handle the case quickly and efficiently.
Hello, Iâ€™m sorry to hear you received the wrong product. Let me assist you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and photos of the item you received so we can verify the issue quickly?
Here is my order number 123456 and attached photos showing the item I received does not match what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method and arrange a return label for the wrong item.
That sounds great, thank you for handling this promptly. I appreciate the quick resolution offer.
The refund has been processed and a prepaid return shipping label was sent to your email. Please return the incorrect item at your convenience.
Just checking in to confirm you have received the refund and the return label. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
We are closing this case now. Thank you for your cooperation, and we hope to serve you better in the future.
